name: Weather Dashboard
description: Utilizing client side API to show user's weather.

name: Daily Planner
description: Using dynamically created HTML elements to display daily activities.

name: New In Town
description: Using two client side API's to present travelers with AIRbnb and Event options.

name: Foodie Digest
description: Utilize 3rd party API & cloud database to search for receipes, save favorites, and return saved recipes.

name: Note Taker
description: Write paths and use express to POST and GET notes!

name: Budget Tracker
description: PWA for budget tracking using data-cache and indexdb (plus service workers and manifests) to allow use of the app while offline. Once you re-connect, all transactions are posted to MongoDB Atlas.
